name: SpeedPainting
0:
”Alexa, open speed painting”
”Alexa, start speed painting”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: speed painting
des:
Improving your drawing skill with some challenges like headshot, Half body or full body drawing with random outfits as well.
Alexa also can give you challenge for 30 minutes, 45 minutes or 60 minutes timer.

Say, "Alexa, pick something from character". She will choose 1 from headshot, half body, etc.
Say, "Alexa, pick something from outfit". She will choose 1 from outfit style.
Say, "Alexa, pick something from Timer Trouble". She will give you timer for your practice.

(This skill doesn't give you automatic countdown for timer. It just help you to make your drawing practice a lot more fun)
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
